description: Snakes are depicted lining up to purchase tickets for a movie. The film's marquee advertises a title directly related to their primary predator. This presents a surreal scenario where the animals are seemingly eager to consume media about a creature that hunts them. The situation is deeply ironic, as their natural instinct would be to avoid any encounter with a mongoose. The image highlights the absurdity of their choice to attend this particular cinematic presentation.
caption: Larson
